::Spears::

She chuckled, "And you'll teach me to kill chairs in this holo-room 
of yours huh?"
She saw him walking next to her in wolf mode and patted his head and 
scratched behind his ear.  She smiled and kept walking. 
"And maybe you can teach me to kill sofa's too."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker grins. "Sure. We can launch it in the holo rooms."
> 
> He slows down as he catches up to her, walking by her side. "The 
Cybertronian 
> Fire has several holo rooms, we could use them."
